call_summary.final_outcome: The receptionist attempted to transfer the caller to the assigned case manager, but she was unavailable. The caller declined to leave a voicemail and instead stated they would send an email to the existing thread and advise the client that the firm would call back later.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist attempted to locate the case manager, Loni, but returned to the line to inform the caller that she was currently on another call.
